alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Madison; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:07PM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Wayne and Pike counties. In New York, Madison, Chenango, Otsego, Delaware and Sullivan counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on untreated back roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will gradually change to rain Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.
